entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
